name: Ultra Savage Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Ultra Savage has arrived with the hottest summer bangers!

Once again it features music made by the same Oneshark member who also is the graphical artist. Comes in MP3 format.

01 - Prisoner 562 Has Escaped
02 - Savage Desert
03 - Out For A Swim
04 - King Triceps
05 - Strong Silent Type
06 - Off With The Heads
07 - My Healthy Imagination
08 - I Can't Get There In Time
09 - Shots Shots Shots
10 - How Did I End Up Here
11 - Timeless
12 - Dark Twisted Secret
13 - Twig Wearing A Wig
14 - Dead People Standing Up
15 - You'll Never See Me Coming
16 - Who's Pulling The Strings?
17 - ULTRA SAVAGE
18 - Turgut's Back

supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
